text: meanwhile shells fell around us in increasing numbers . some , meeting the liquid surface , would ricochet and vanish into the sea at considerable distances . but none of them reached the nautilus .

the tide was already strong , for in three days the moon would be full , and it was enough to keep the boat in the center of the current , where it floated swiftly along between the high banks without its being necessary to increase its speed by the aid of the oars .
thus the colony was increased by a new member .

as usual , dinner was served me in my stateroom . full of anxiety , i ate little . i left the table at seven o'clock . 120 minutes-- i was keeping track of them -- still separated me from the moment i was to rejoin ned land . my agitation increased . my pulse was throbbing violently . i could n't stand still . i walked up and down , hoping to calm my troubled mind with movement . the possibility of perishing in our reckless undertaking was the least of my worries ; my heart was pounding at the thought that our plans might be discovered before we had left the nautilus , at the thought of being hauled in front of captain nemo and finding him angered , or worse , saddened by my deserting him .
the resources of the colony , particularly in vegetables and corn , increased from day to day , and the plants brought from tabor island had succeeded perfectly .
soon the swiftness of the descent increased horribly , and threatened to become a fall . i no longer had the strength to stop myself .
" sir , " said milady , " is your presence an indispensable accessory of my captivity ? could you not spare me the increase of torture which your visits cause me ? "
the storm increased , the flashes succeeded one another more rapidly , the thunder began to growl , and the wind , the precursor of a hurricane , whistled in the plumes and the hair of the horsemen .

" when i wanted to determine what increase in weight the nautilus needed to be given in order to submerge , i had only to take note of the proportionate reduction in volume that salt water experiences in deeper and deeper strata . "

and they opened amazingly wide . eyes and spyglasses ( a bit dazzled , it is true , by the vista of $ 2,000.00 ) did n't remain at rest for an instant . day and night we observed the surface of the ocean , and those with nyctalopic eyes , whose ability to see in the dark increased their chances by fifty percent , had an excellent shot at winning the prize .
the blazing resin , whose illuminating power increased still more by the rapidity of its fall , lighted up the interior of the well , but yet nothing appeared .
the wind was already strong , and increased with the decline of day .
herbert 's weakness visibly increased .
it had appeared necessary to enlarge their dimensions , for the feathered population had increased considerably .

it was apparently considered out of the question to dive by filling the ballast tanks . perhaps they would n't sufficiently increase the nautilus 's specific gravity . moreover , in order to come back up , it would be necessary to expel the excess water , and our pumps might not have been strong enough to overcome the outside pressure .

five hundred feet only separated the explorers from the plateau , which they wished to reach so as to establish there an encampment for the night , but these five hundred feet were increased to more than two miles by the zigzags which they had to describe .
friend mousqueton , you see that we have a reinforcement , and we must have an increase of supplies . "
how wonderfully had the field increased in extent , since eighteen months ago , when the first grain of wheat was sown !
towards the west , a cloudy belt , clearly visible at the horizon , increased the gloom , and the eye could not discover if the sky and water were blended together in the same circular line .
the company all stared at each other again , and the general astonishment was increased .

gideon spilett said no more , and soon , in spite of the explosions of the volcano , whose intensity increased , and which were repeated by the echoes of the island , the inhabitants of granite house were sleeping soundly .
their hunger was thus appeased for the time , but not their thirst , which increased after eating these naturally - spiced molluscs .

meanwhile i was carefully examining these unleashed breakers . they measured up to fifteen meters in height over a length of 150 to 175 meters , and the speed of their propagation ( half that of the wind ) was fifteen meters per second . their volume and power increased with the depth of the waters . i then understood the role played by these waves , which trap air in their flanks and release it in the depths of the sea where its oxygen brings life . their utmost pressure -- it has been calculated-- can build to 3,000 kilograms on every square foot of surface they strike . it was such waves in the hebrides that repositioned a stone block weighing 84,000 pounds . it was their relatives in the tidal wave on december 23 , 1854 , that toppled part of the japanese city of tokyo , then went that same day at 700 kilometers per hour to break on the beaches of america .
what could it avail to sow , to reap , to hunt , to increase the stores of granite house ?

2 . an aneroid barometer , to indicate extreme pressures of the atmosphere . an ordinary barometer would not have answered the purpose , as the pressure would increase during our descent to a point which the mercurial barometer [ 1 ] would not register .
